C I R C U L A R   NO.  01 / 2007 
 
Subject:         CATEGORIZATION OF AIRPORTS 
 
 
 Threat perception at all operational airports in the country has been 
reviewed in consultation with intelligence agencies. In suppersession of 
previous Circular No. 37/2005 dated 5.9.2005 on the above subject, a 
revised consolidated list of Normal, Sensitive and Hypersensitive airports is 
given below for information and necessary action: 
 
(A)      NORMAL AIRPORTS 
 
(i)
